gobblin.hive.policy

Class HiveRegistrationPolicyBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.hive.policy.HiveRegistrationPolicyBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiveRegistrationPolicy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveSnapshotRegistrationPolicy

    @Alpha
public class HiveRegistrationPolicyBase
extends Object
implements HiveRegistrationPolicy
    A base implementation of HiveRegistrationPolicy. It obtains database name from property HIVE_DATABASE_NAME or HIVE_DATABASE_REGEX (group 1), obtains table name from property HIVE_TABLE_NAME and HIVE_TABLE_REGEX (group 1), and builds a SimpleHiveSpec.

    • Method Detail

      • getDatabaseName

        protected com.google.common.base.Optional<String> getDatabaseName(Path path)
        This method first tries to obtain the database name from HIVE_DATABASE_NAME. If this property is not specified, it then tries to obtain the database name using the first group of HIVE_DATABASE_REGEX.

      • getDatabaseNames

        protected Iterable<String> getDatabaseNames(Path path)
        Obtain Hive database names. The returned Iterable contains the database name returned by getDatabaseName(Path) (if present) plus additional database names specified in ADDITIONAL_HIVE_DATABASE_NAMES.

      • getTableName

        protected com.google.common.base.Optional<String> getTableName(Path path)
        This method first tries to obtain the database name from HIVE_TABLE_NAME. If this property is not specified, it then tries to obtain the database name using the first group of HIVE_TABLE_REGEX.

      • getTableNames

        protected Iterable<String> getTableNames(Path path)
        Obtain Hive table names. The returned Iterable contains the table name returned by getTableName(Path) (if present) plus additional table names specified in ADDITIONAL_HIVE_TABLE_NAMES.

      • getDatabaseOrTableName

        protected String getDatabaseOrTableName(Path path,
                                        String nameKey,
                                        String regexKey,
                                        com.google.common.base.Optional<Pattern> pattern)

      • sanitizeAndValidateName

        protected String sanitizeAndValidateName(String name)

      • getTables

        protected List<HiveTable> getTables(Path path)
                             throws IOException
        A base implementation for creating HiveTables given a Path.

        This method returns a list of Hivetables that contains one table per db name (returned by getDatabaseNames(Path)) and table name (returned by getTableNames(Path).

        Parameters:
        path - a Path used to create the HiveTable.
        Returns:
        a list of HiveTables for the given Path.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getTable

        protected HiveTable getTable(Path path,
                             String dbName,
                             String tableName)
                      throws IOException
        A base implementation for creating a non bucketed, external HiveTable for a Path.
        Parameters:
        path - a Path used to create the HiveTable.
        dbName - the database name for the created HiveTable.
        tableName - the table name for the created HiveTable.
        Returns:
        a HiveTables for the given Path.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getTableLocation

        protected Path getTableLocation(Path path)

      • isNameValid

        protected static boolean isNameValid(String name)
        Determine whether a database or table name is valid. A name is valid if and only if: it starts with an alphanumeric character, contains only alphanumeric characters and '_', and is NOT composed of numbers only.

      • sanitizeName

        protected static String sanitizeName(String name)
        Attempt to sanitize an invalid database or table name by replacing characters that are not alphanumeric or '_' with '_'.

      • getHiveSpecs

        public Collection<HiveSpec> getHiveSpecs(Path path)
                                  throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: HiveRegistrationPolicy
        Get a collection of HiveSpecs for a Path, which can be used by HiveRegister to register the given Path.
        Specified by:
        getHiveSpecs in interface HiveRegistrationPolicy
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPolicy

        public static HiveRegistrationPolicy getPolicy(State props)
        Get a HiveRegistrationPolicy from a State object.
        Parameters:
        props - A State object that contains property, #HIVE_REGISTRATION_POLICY, which is the class name of the desired policy. This policy class must have a constructor that takes a State object.
